alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kankakee, northern Newton, southern Lake and Jasper Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Village, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rensselaer, DeMotte, Wheatfield, Lake Village, Roselawn, Hopkins Park, Shelby, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Schneider, Mount Ayr, Thayer, Sumava Resorts, Baileys Corner, Stoutsburg, Fair Oaks and Parr. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 214 and 235. This includes... US 41 Dragway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Illinois.
